string-array.name: data_movie_synopsis
string-array.item: This film reveals the origin of Arthur Curry, a mighty human who can control water and sea animals. Where did he get his strength? Who are his parents, and does he deserve to be a king in the ocean?
The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice everything in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before he succeeds in destroying the universe.

Tells about the mysterious terror to the world\'s population that results in mass suicide. After attacking Siberia and spreading to various parts of Europe, the mysterious event finally attacked American citizens.

Taking place 20 years before the events of the first film, which will be 1987, Bumblebee takes shelter in a small California beach wreck. A teenage girl named Charlie Watson learned that it wasn\'t an ordinary Volkswagen Beetle.
Creed II will continue the story of Adonis Johnson inside and outside the ring as he faces fame, family problems and an ongoing mission to become a true champion.

Wade Wilson (Ryan Reynolds) tries to protect a mysterious mutant targeted by Cable (Josh Brolin). To protect it, Wade then formed a team called X-Force that consisted of Deadpool himself, Domino, Negasonic Teenage.

Film Glass will continue the search for Kevin Wendell Crumb who escaped after kidnapping the girls. Kevin Wendel Crumbang has 20 personalities in one soul and can turn into a monster when his personality named The Beast appears.
Hunter Killer will tell about the mission of the United States submarine team to rescue the Russian president who was couped by militant groups in his country.
Spider-Man crosses parallel dimensions and collaborates with Spider-Men from these dimensions to stop threats to all reality.
A 90-year-old horticultural expert and Korean War veteran was caught transporting $ 3 million worth of cocaine through Illinois for Mexican drug cartels.

A journalist, Eddie Brock (Tom Hardy) wants to make an investment case for the discovery led by Dr. Carlton Drake (Riz Ahmed). Because of his investigation, Eddie visited Dr.\'s lab Calrlton Drake. Everything is intended to prove that Dr. Carlton Drake is doing an evil act using Symbiote.

string-array.name: data_tv_show_synopsis
string-array.item: Centers on a Southern California family, whose excessive lifestyle is fueled by their criminal activities.
Astronaut Niko Breckenridge and her young crew face unimaginable danger as they go on a high-risk mission to explore the genesis of an alien artifact.
A blind lawyer by day, vigilante by night. Matt Murdock fights the crime of New York as Daredevil.
Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for thousands of years.
David Haller is a troubled young man diagnosed as schizophrenic, but after a strange encounter, he discovers special powers that will change his life forever.

Elliot, a brilliant but highly unstable young cyber-security engineer and vigilante hacker, becomes a key figure in a complex game of global dominance when he and his shadowy allies try to take down the corrupt corporation he works for.

Due to a political conspiracy, an innocent man is sent to death row and his only hope is his brother, who makes it his mission to deliberately get himself sent to the same prison in order to break the both of them out, from the inside.
Abby Arcane returns home to Marais, Louisiana to investigate a deadly swamp-borne virus, only to discover the dark, terrifying mysteries of the swamp.
Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins, and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.
In a world where mutated humans are treated with distrust and fear, an institute for mutants battles to achieve peaceful co-existence with humanity.
A team of young superheroes led by Nightwing (formerly Batman\'s first Robin) form to combat evil and other perils.
